attributes.action: Parliament must now honor the result of the 2016 referendum.
attributes.additional_details: She should now honor the result of the 2016 referendum by LEAVING THE EU WITHOUT A DEAL ON 12th APRIL 2019.
attributes.background: In the past, Theresa May has told the EU that she would rather have “no deal” than one which is a “bad deal for Britain.” It is time for her to finally accept that her deal is, in fact, a “bad deal for Britain.”
